title: 40 for 40, 2019 Edition: The Intensely Geopolitical Bowl Preview
description:
At least two things happen on this episode:
The Alamo, Armed Forces, Cheez-It, First Responder, Independence, Liberty, and Military Bowls are mentioned in some way.
We trade Missouri for Mexico.
Which one of those two is worse for national unity? Hard to say. We'll look back in ten or twenty years and know the answer, though, so that's fun.
